title: Morningstar +1
content:
Morningstar +1 Uncommon 2~9 Damage 1d8+1Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: It's said that one warrior with a morningstar is worth seventeen with a sword - one for each of the weapon's spikes. Morningstar 1.8 65
